description: Try our easy to follow Prawns With Garlic & Chilli recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawns With Garlic & Chilli Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 cloves garlic, grated or finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a frying pan over a medium heat, add the garlic and chilli, and cook gently for 2 minutes.

Add the sherry and prawns, turn up the heat, and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes, or until the juices have reduced by half. Season with salt and black pepper and serve with fresh crusty bread and a crisp salad.
